entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:29 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kirkland Lake 7:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
